TopicTitle: Allow access to ModuleAnimateGeneric to be enabled/disabled in the Flight Scene and EVA

Articles.Content:
This is probably more useful for add-on authors than end users, but I'd still like to give this a go.

Currently, parts using ModuleAnimateGeneric can have their animated states toggled in the VAB/SPH scene, as well as in flight (active vessel or EVA). I would like to suggest the following enhancements:

- disableInFlight: if true, the animation cannot be toggled in the flight scene, otherwise defaults to false. Useful for components designed to be only configured before launch within the VAB/SPH scene.

- disableInEVA: if true, the animation cannot be toggled by a Kerbal on EVA, otherwise defaults to false. Useful for components design to be only operated when the vessel itself is being actively controlled.

(Submitted as Feature #3410 on the SQUAD KSP bugtracker)
